labels.analysis: The MCP Server functions as an agent orchestration system designed to manage task workflows through state transitions. It focuses on planning, researching, executing, and reviewing tasks by maintaining conversation context and state. While the available tools (add_numbers, format_text, long_running_task) are relatively basic, they suggest a foundation for processing and managing data within the orchestration workflow. The system integrates with LLMs and Claude for Desktop to enhance knowledge management and workflow efficiency.
labels.reasoning: The primary functionality revolves around task and workflow management, making "Development Tools" an appropriate label as it aids in task planning and execution. Additionally, the focus on state-based management and context maintenance aligns with workflow automation concepts, justifying a secondary "Daily Productivity" label. The server's unique role in agent orchestration warrants a custom label.

tools.name: format_text
tools.description:
Format text according to the specified format type.
    
    Args:
        text: The text to format
        format_type: The formatting to apply (uppercase, lowercase, title)

tools.name: long_running_task
tools.description:
Simulate a long-running task with progress reporting.
    
    Args:
        steps: Number of steps to simulate
        ctx: The MCP context for progress reporting

server_info_crawled.name: Agent Orchestration System
server_info_crawled.author: @aviz85/mcp-agents-orchestra
server_info_crawled.overview: Implement a state-based agent orchestration system that manages task planning, researching, executing, and reviewing through defined agent states. Enable seamless interaction with LLMs by exposing resources, tools, and prompts to maintain conversation context and state transitions. Facilitate integration with Claude for Desktop to enhance agent workflows and knowledge management.

tools.name: format_text
tools.description:
Format text according to the specified format type.
    
    Args:
        text: The text to format
        format_type: The formatting to apply (uppercase, lowercase, title)

tools.name: long_running_task
tools.description:
Simulate a long-running task with progress reporting.
    
    Args:
        steps: Number of steps to simulate
        ctx: The MCP context for progress reporting

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@aviz85/mcp-agents-orchestra/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
